document.full_text: south african tim clark said wednesday he is not going to let a nagging elbow injury get in the way of defending his players championship title this week at the tpc sawgrass.
document.title: clark will battle elbow pain to defend sawgrass title
lines_and_colors: south african tim clark said wednesday he is not going to let a nagging elbow injury get in the way of defending his players championship title this week at the tpc sawgrass.
